name.japanese: ホーディ・ジョーンズ

keyMoments.title: Attacks Shyarly
keyMoments.description: Enraged by Shyarly's prophecy, Hody attacks her with a water bullet for contradicting his narrative.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Hody's violent response to opposition and his intolerance for anyone who challenges his authority.

keyMoments.title: Confesses to Assassinating Queen Otohime
keyMoments.description: Hody publicly confesses that he was the one who assassinated Queen Otohime ten years ago, shocking everyone.
keyMoments.significance: This is the pivotal revelation that exposes Hody as the true villain behind the tragedy that shaped Fish-Man Island's recent history.
keyMoments.quote: I was the assassin who killed Queen Otohime!

keyMoments.title: Reveals Assassination Plot Details
keyMoments.description: Hody explains how he paid a human pirate to burn the signatures, shot Otohime during the confusion, and killed the pirate to frame humans.
keyMoments.significance: Exposes the manipulation that turned Fish-Man Island citizens against humans and shows Hody's calculated evil.
keyMoments.quote: I paid that pirate to burn the box of signatures, and I shot Otohime in the confusion and killed the human to fool the island.

keyMoments.title: Shoots King Neptune
keyMoments.description: After confessing, Hody shoots King Neptune with a water bullet when the king expresses rage at his wife's killer.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Hody's complete disregard for the royal family and willingness to kill to maintain control.

reveals.information: Assassinated Queen Otohime ten years ago
Paid a human pirate to burn petition signatures and framed him for the assassination

keyMoments.title: Captured by New Fish-Man Pirates
keyMoments.description: Falls into a trap using a balloon duplicate of Neptune and is captured along with Jinbe and Megalo.
keyMoments.significance: Brings Shirahoshi into Hody's control, setting up the confrontation where truth is revealed.

keyMoments.title: Reveals She Already Knew About Hody
keyMoments.description: When Hody taunts her about killing Otohime, Shirahoshi tearfully reveals she already knew the truth.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Shirahoshi's incredible strength and compassion - she kept the secret to honor her mother's dying wish not to seek revenge.

reveals.information: Knew Hody Jones killed her mother Otohime for ten years
Kept silent about the killer's identity to honor Otohime's dying wish not to seek revenge

keyMoments.title: Predicts Luffy Will Destroy Fish-Man Island
keyMoments.description: Publicly declares at Gyoncorde Plaza that Luffy, not Hody, will destroy Fish-Man Island, backed by her reputation for accurate predictions.
keyMoments.significance: Undermines Hody's authority and foreshadows Luffy's role in the island's fate, creating tension about destiny versus intention.
keyMoments.quote: The one who will destroy Fish-Man Island is not you, Hody. It's Straw Hat Luffy.

keyMoments.title: Attacked by Hody Jones
keyMoments.description: Is attacked with a water bullet by Hody after delivering her prophecy.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the danger of speaking truth to power and Hody's violent intolerance of opposition.

name.japanese: バンダー・デッケン九世

keyMoments.title: Sends Noah Toward Fish-Man Island
keyMoments.description: Uses his Mato Mato no Mi power to lift the massive ship Noah and send it flying toward Fish-Man Island to destroy it and Shirahoshi.
keyMoments.significance: Creates an existential threat to the entire island, escalating the conflict and setting up the climax of the arc.
keyMoments.quote: I will destroy Fish-Man Island and Shirahoshi with it!

abilities.abilityName: Mato Mato no Mi - Noah Control
abilities.description: Uses the Mark-Mark Fruit to target Shirahoshi and send the massive ancient ship Noah flying toward her location.

keyMoments.title: Captured by New Fish-Man Pirates
keyMoments.description: Falls into a trap along with Shirahoshi and Megalo, resulting in their capture and imprisonment at Gyoncorde Plaza.
keyMoments.significance: Even the powerful former Warlord is now in Hody's control, showing the dire situation.

keyMoments.title: Shot by Hody Jones
keyMoments.description: After expressing rage at learning Hody killed his wife Otohime, Neptune is shot with a water bullet by Hody.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Hody's willingness to kill the king and his complete takeover of Fish-Man Island.
